mapper.sql: IDS, USERID, TITLE, DETAIL, HAPPEND, REMARKS, BACKUP1, BACKUP2, STATUS
mapper.insert: insert into TEST.MH_DATEBOOK (USERID, TITLE, DETAIL, HAPPEND, REMARKS, BACKUP1, BACKUP2, STATUS) values (#{userid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{happend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{backup1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backup2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update TEST.MH_DATEBOOK
USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DETAIL = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HAPPEND = #{happend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BACKUP1 = #{backup1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACKUP2 = #{backup2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where IDS = #{ids,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
